info.title: PurrVet Mobile API
info.description: REST API for the PurrVet mobile application. Provides pet owners with access to pet management, appointments, notifications, and profile features.

get.description: Returns all appointments across the clinic. The owner's own appointments include full details; other owners' appointments show limited info.

post.description: Book a single appointment for a pet. The time slot must not already be taken.
Book multiple services at the same time slot as a grouped appointment. All services share the same date/time from the first valid item.
Request cancellation for all appointments in a group. Only groups where every appointment is still pending/requested can be cancelled.

get.description: Returns all 5-minute time slots between 09:00 and 18:00 for a given date, indicating which are available or already booked.
Returns all available service categories with their subtypes, used when creating appointments.

post.description: Authenticate with email and password. Returns JWT tokens directly, or a 2FA challenge if verification is required.
Submit the 6-digit code sent to the user's email to complete two-factor authentication and receive JWT tokens.
Create a new pet owner account. The account is immediately active and the user can log in after registration.
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access/refresh token pair. The old refresh token is revoked (rotation).
Revoke the provided refresh token, ending the session on this device.
Send a password reset link to the user's email address. The link expires in 1 hour.
Set a new password using the token from the password reset email. The new password cannot match the current one.

get.description: Returns the owner's dashboard data including their pets, upcoming appointments, and vaccination/deworming items due within 5 days.
Returns paginated notifications for the authenticated owner. Supports filtering by type (e.g. Appointment, Pet), read status, and text search.
Returns the total number of unread notifications for the authenticated owner.

put.description: Mark a single notification as read by its ID.
Mark all unread notifications as read for the authenticated owner.

get.description: Returns all pets belonging to the authenticated owner, ordered by most recently added.

post.description: Create a new pet for the authenticated owner. Accepts an optional photo that will be cropped to 500x500 JPEG.

get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific pet including paginated appointment history. Supports filtering by service category and text search on notes.

put.description: Update pet information. All fields are optional â€” only provided fields are updated. A new photo replaces the existing one.

get.description: Returns a sorted list of breed names for the given pet type (`dog` or `cat`), sourced from the clinic's breed dataset.
Returns the pet's health card with paginated completed appointment records, owner contact info, and age in months.
Generate and download an A5 PDF of the pet's vaccination and deworming health card.
Returns the authenticated owner's profile including name, email, phone, and profile image URL.

put.description: Update the owner's first name, last name, and phone number. Names must contain only letters, spaces, and hyphens.
Change the owner's password. Requires the current password for verification. The new password must be at least 8 characters.
Upload a new profile photo. The previous photo file is deleted from the server.

Bearer.description: Enter your JWT access token. Obtain one via `POST /api/v1/auth/login`.
